trans:
- The results of the [assembly vote] will be reflected in the assembly of the next competition team.
ğŸ“Œ Vote Event
- Upon completing the voting mission, a Weverse Collection badge will be awarded, and 25 winners will be selected through a draw to receive tickets to attend.
ğŸ“Œ Vote Event Notes
1. When participating in the vote, Weverse Company will provide the voting participation history (nickname, W ID) to SLL Central for winner selection.
2. Only for event winners, additional personal information (email address) will be provided to SLL Central.
- Purpose of Provision: To inquire about the personal information (name/date of birth/nationality/contact details) necessary for prize delivery to the winners at SLL Central.
3. Winners will receive a separate notification via email on November 2nd. If there is no reply to the email by noon (KST) on Monday, November 4th, the prize may not be received.
4. The collected personal information will not be used for any purpose other than prize delivery.
- Retention and use period of collected personal information: Applicants within 7 days after the winner announcement, and winners for up to 1 year
5. If you wish to refuse the provision of personal information for prize delivery after winning the event, please submit your refusal to the "Customer Service." (If no refusal is expressed by the end of the event, it will be considered as implicit consent to provide personal information.)
